    • addBook

      @PostMapping("/admin/addbook") public String addBook(@Valid @Valid Book book, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Add a new book to the database.
      Parameters:
      book - - the book to add
      result - - the result of the validation
      model - - the model
      Returns:
      - the add-book page if the validation fails, the admin page if the validation succeeds

      Parameters:
      book - - the book to update
      result - - the result of the validation
      model - - the model
      principal - - the user
      Returns:
